tool_description: Provides historical, cultural, and archaeological background information for scripture passages to aid interpretation.

reference.description: Scripture reference to get historical context for

context_scope.description: Scope of context: immediate, book_level, period, or comprehensive

error_messages: Invalid reference: Provide a valid scripture reference in standard format.
Invalid context scope: Use one of [immediate, book_level, period, comprehensive].
Historical data unavailable: Limited historical context available for this passage.
usage: Provide a scripture reference and optionally specify context scope and information types. Returns comprehensive historical background to enhance understanding.

time_period.description: Historical time period of the passage
